Articles.Content:
This account is here primarily to verify content from mod authors moving their projects onto CurseForge. If you don't know my name, I work for CurseForge as well as FTB and am a modpack designer. I have been involved in various modding communities off and on for awhile and now do this for a living. If there is one thing important to me about an authors content, is that it is theirs and that is what I am here for. You will probly never see me post beyond this thread, but this post is primarily so authors know who I am.

Salutations and happy Kerbaling.
